config.general.title: General
config.previewBeforeFix.desc: Preview and adjust changes before fixing
config.translationFunctionNames.desc: A list of custom translation function names that can be used for internationalization
config.syncBasedOnReferredEntries.desc: When syncing entries, use the reference language file as the baseline. Otherwise, all language files are used as the basis.
config.projectPath.title: Project Root Path
config.translateServices.title: Translation Services
config.baiduAppId.desc: Baidu Translate Open Platform APP ID
config.baiduSecretKey.desc: Baidu Translate Open Platform Secret Key
config.translationHints.title: Translate Inline Hints
config.translateHintsEnableLooseKeyMatch: Enable fuzzy matching for dynamically constructed keys (e.g. t(`prefix.${key}.suffix`)`). When multiple translations match, only the first result will be displayed. Recommended only if such patterns are widely used in your project, as false positives may occur
config.translateHintsMaxLength.desc: Maximum number of characters for inline translation hints
config.translateHintsFontColorInLight.de: Hint text color in light theme (hexadecimal)
config.translateHintsBackgroundColorInLi: Hint background base color in light theme (hexadecimal)
config.translateHintsBackgroundAlphaInLi: Hint background transparency in light theme (0-1)
config.translateHintsFontColorInDark.des: Hint text color in dark theme (hexadecimal)
config.translateHintsBackgroundColorInDa: Hint background base color in dark theme (hexadecimal)
config.translateHintsBackgroundAlphaInDa: Hint background transparency in dark theme (0-1)
config.langAliasCustomMappings.desc: Custom language alias mapping (format: { 'language_code': ['alias1', 'alias2'] }), where language codes follow Google Translate's country/region code standard
config.workspace.title: Workspace Configuration Only
config.sorting.writeCode: Specifies the sorting method used when writing language files (flat structure only)
config.sorting.exportMode: Specifies the sorting method used when exporting to Excel or CSV
config.i18nFeatures.title: I18n Feature
config.i18nFeatures.auto: Follows the default behavior of the selected i18n framework
config.defaultNamespace.desc: Specifies the default namespace used in frameworks like react-i18next and i18next. If no namespace is explicitly provided in t() calls, this default will be used. Make sure the namespace is properly loaded
config.matchExistingKey.desc: When enabled, if a missing key like t('未定义') is used, the plugin will try to find an existing key in the reference language where the value matches (e.g., '未定义') and replace the text with that key (e.g., 'undefined'). If matched, auto-translation will not be triggered
config.autoTranslateMissingKey.desc: When enabled, if a missing entry like t('未定义') cannot be matched to any existing key in the reference language, the plugin will call the translation service to translate the text, generate a key (e.g., 'undefined'), insert it into the language file, and replace the text in source code. This only applies if no existing key was found
config.generatedKeyStyle.desc: Naming style for auto-generated keys when translating missing entries
config.stopWords.desc: List of stop words to exclude from auto-generated keys
config.maxGeneratedKeyLength.desc: Maximum length for generated keys. If exceeded, a key will be generated using the format “filename + Text + index”. The filename will be truncated if necessary
config.keyPrefix.desc: Prefix used for auto-generated keys. Options include: most frequent prefix in project, no prefix, or a custom value
config.writeRules.title: Write Rules
config.languageFileIndent.desc: Number of spaces used for indentation when writing language files. If not set, the extension will infer the indent size from existing file content
config.quoteStyle.auto: Detect and follow the most commonly used quote style in the language file
config.quoteStyleForKey.desc: Quote style to use for translation keys
config.quoteStyleForValue.desc: Quote style to use for translation values

command.setDisplayLang.title: Set as Display Language

command.copyValue.title: Copy Entry Value
command.copyKeyValue.title: Copy Key-Value Pair
command.editValue.title: Edit Entry Value
command.deleteUnused.title: Delete Unused Entries
command.markAsUsed.title: Mark as Used
command.goToReference.title: Go to Reference
command.goToDefinition.title: Go to Definition
command.setProjectPath.title: Set to the project root path
command.setLangPath.title: Set to the translation file directory
command.ignoreDirectory.title: Ignore This Directory
command.ignoreLang.title: Ignore This Language
command.unignoreLang.title: Unignore This Language
